array.name: CREATE_TABLE_SQL
array.item: CREATE TABLE area (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE desk (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT,area INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE command (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,type INTEGER,number INTERGER,desk INTERGER)
CREATE TABLE robot (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,ip INTEGER,electric INTERGER,type INTERGER ,lastlocation INTEGER)
